name: Circuit Ranger
description:
In Circuit Ranger you control a hacker who is tasked to gain access to corporate servers. He does this by plugging himself into their defenses and deactivating their firewalls. Try to complete the 4 missions in a row.

Controls

Move around with WASD / Arrows

Swipe with the knife with Spacebar

Shoot your gun with Left Shift

When you reach the server press the black input field with the mouse and input the number.

For a more detailed description play the tutorial.
